#include<iostream>
#include<algorithm>
#include<functional>

using namespace std;


int main()
{
   int t;
   cin>>t;
   while(t--)
   {
       int input[11];
       int k;
       for(int i=0;i<11;i++)
        cin>>input[i];
       cin>>k;
       int arr[k];
       sort(input,input+11,greater<int>());
       for(int i=0;i<k;i++)
        arr[i]=input[i];

       int count1=0;
       int i=k;

      while(arr[k-1]==input[i] && i<11)
      {
          count1++;
          i++;
      }
      int count2=1;
       i=k-2;
    while(arr[k-1]==arr[i] && i>=0)
    {
        count2++;
        i--;
    }

    int count=count1+count2;

    int n=1,r=1;
    while(count2)
    {
        n*=count;
        r*=count2;
        count--;
        count2--;

    }
    cout<<(n/r)<<endl;
   }

    return 0;
}
